subject: Murders and Attempted Murders
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Hopelessness, rage that grew from poverty and inequality, and Brazil’s wider culture of knives and revenge may have played a part in a confrontation on a soccer field that turned gruesome.
snippet: Hopelessness, rage that grew from poverty and inequality, and Brazil’s wider culture of knives and revenge may have played a part in a confrontation on a soccer field that turned gruesome.
